div.p: Composite of the depth–zonal distribution of monthly equatorial potential temperature anomalies averaged between 5°S−5°N (shading; °C) during the El Niño developing years (2004−2016). a Distribution of monthly equatorial potential temperature anomalies after removing the simultaneous WNP ACE. b As in a, but relating to the simultaneous WNP ACE. An El Niño developing year is defined when the above-moderate El Niño events (including moderate events) develops from weak to strong
